subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN1986 is on the way
description_text:
Hi, I wanted to check on this order.  It said it was shipped on tuesday,
but fedex still doesnt have the package.

conversations.body_text:
Hi.  I cant see the ticket.  I bought the item with shop and it wont let me
create an account, says my email is already registered.

On Sat, Jul 19, 2025 at 2:18 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi andy dickeson,    I contacted an employee at our US warehouse who responded that the parcel has been sent but there is no logistics update yet. Please don't worry, there should be an update today.
Hello. Any updates? Still not showing as shipped Sent from my iPhone

Hi andy dickeson,  Don't worry — our U.S. warehouse will ship according to our instructions. However, their response time might not be as fast as ours, so we appreciate your patience. Typically, the shipping process proceeds without any issues.
Ok. FedEx says the shipment info was sent to them Sunday the 13th. But they haven’t received the package yet. Almost 1.5 weeks later now. Sent from my iPhone
Hi andy dickeson,      Your parcel may have been lost by the courier, we will resend it for you, sorry for the inconvenience!
Hi andy dickeson,    The US warehouse staff advised us to wait two more days as Fedex can only investigate if there is no update for more than two weeks.

That’s  crazy lol. Part of my order came from china and is almost here. But a package from California takes 2 weeks. Come on


Sent from my iPhone

>

Hi andy dickeson,    Your parcel has been found by FedEx and re-shipped. It is expected to arrive on the 29th. This is the first time we have encountered this situation. FedEx is usually very reliable.

Hello.  I received the pedals and haptics, but I did not receive the 3
extra springs I ordered.

On Thu, Jul 24, 2025 at 9:32 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi andy dickeson,    I confirmed with the warehouse staff that this spring is out of stock and is expected to be available in mid-August. We apologize for the inconvenience and have refunded your payment.
